description:
Increase in sugar production by microbiological inhibition of the 
Leuconostoc spp. and other bacteria (Phase II)

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project research work aims at to generalize toward other sugar mills the use of the product and to extend validation of the product. To achieve a commercial product that allows decreasing the sucrose losses due to deterioration of the cane juices and by the effects of the micro organisms is immediate objective.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: INCREASING SUGAR PRODUCTION

title: INCREASE IN SUGAR PRODUCTION BY MICROBIOLOGICAL INHIBIT.
